testcase.name: Register User
testcase.system-out: Given Launch browser........................................................passed When Navigate to url AutomationExercise.....................................passed Then Verify that home page is visible successfully..........................passed And Click on Signup-Login button............................................passed And Verify New User Signup! is visible......................................passed Then Enter name and email address...........................................passed And Click Signup button.....................................................passed Then Verify that ENTER ACCOUNT INFORMATION is visible.......................passed And Fill details: Title, Name, Email, Password, Date of birth...............passed And Select checkbox Sign up for our newsletter!.............................passed And Select checkbox Receive special offers from our partners!...............passed And Fill details: First name, Last name, Company, Address, Address2, Country, State, City, Zipcode, Mobile Number.passed Then Click (Create Account button)..........................................passed And Verify that ACCOUNT CREATED! is visible.................................passed Then Click Continue button..................................................passed And Verify that Logged in as username is visible............................passed Then Click Delete Account button............................................passed And Verify that ACCOUNT DELETED! is visible and click Continue button.......passed

testcase.name: Login User with correct email and password
testcase.system-out: Given Launch browser........................................................passed When Navigate to url AutomationExercise.....................................passed Then Verify that home page is visible successfully..........................passed And Click on Signup-Login button............................................passed Given Verify Login to your account is visible...............................passed Then Enter correct email address and password...............................passed And Click login button......................................................passed And Verify that Logged in as username is visible............................passed Then Click Delete Account button............................................passed And Verify that ACCOUNT DELETED! is visible and click Continue button.......passed
